name: Lambda High Error rate - {{functionname.name}} error rate at {{value}}% - DD Example
message:
Function {{functionname.name}} has been executing with a high error rate of {{value}}% for the last 30 mins. 
Please investigate - see the function in [Datadog Lambda](https://app.datadoghq.com/functions?search=%7B%22functionname%22%3A%7B%22type%22%3A%22included%22%2C%22list%22%3A%5B%22{{functionname.name}}%22%5D%7D%7D). 

For changes to the function see [AWS console](https://{{region.name}}.console.aws.amazon.com/lambda/home?region={{region.name}}#/functions
